alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued August 03 at 3:19PM EDT until August 04 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM EDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (3.2 to 12.6 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Eastern Essex MA, Suffolk MA, Eastern Norfolk MA, Eastern Plymouth MA and Barnstable MA Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 3 AM EDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding is expected along the North Shore from Gloucester to Newburyport. Wave action will likely cause some washover onto coastal roads around the time of high tide. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Gloucester Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 15.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.0 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 03/01 PM 10.3/10.8 0.8/ 1.3 0.2/ 0.8 2 None 04/02 AM 11.3/11.8 1.8/ 2.2 0.1/ 0.6 3 Minor 04/02 PM 10.4/10.9 0.9/ 1.4 0.2/ 0.7 3 None 05/02 AM 11.2/11.7 1.7/ 2.2 0.2/ 0.8 2-3 Minor 05/03 PM 10.6/11.1 1.1/ 1.6 0.2/ 0.8 2 None Merrimack River near Newburyport MA MLLW Categories -
